title: Compliment the poster above you.

title: Re: Compliment the poster above you.
content: Your incredible wit and amazing talent for being able to read my mind and post what I was thinking before I am able to, is nothing less than mind boggling.

title: Re: Compliment the poster above you.
content:
Gal's Blegd and Smeeg comic strip is quite the Keen work of art and something I've not seen on a regular basis since TMST's Keen comics. LL and some others have even made their own versions of the strip, which not even TMST got. You know you're doing something good then. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

I'm going to feel awkward if this thread dies now...--------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: Compliment the poster above you.
content:
SpikeNexus' PCCW is a useful, interesting and well laid-out Crystal Caves website. It has plenty of clearly written content and has lots of interesting information about Crystal Caves which might not necessarily be available elsewhere (like the Frank Maddin interview). Also, he linked to my site. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

Hahah, now someone has to compliment me. Or not... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] [url=http://last.fm/users/grafix5000/][img]http://toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobbler.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://toxicsheep.com]toxicsheep.com[/url] | [url=http://commanderkeen.org]coming up next...[/url]
